ABOUT ME

Jun 23, 2019

Hi, my name is Haonan Dong. I am a junior undergraduate student in School of Geodesy and Geomatics, Wuhan University, China. Currently, I still stay in Wuhan, China to take my third term.

About my Reserch Interest, I am interested in fancy technology concerning VISION technology and autonomous system, though it is so generate. To be more specific, I am fond of SLAM, and vision measurement, vision navigation through AR/VR platform in particular.

Contact me with august_dong@163.com or haonandong.cn@gmail.com Thanks for visiting my original website.
